content: the voyages beanie is fast & easy to make and uses small amounts of yarn so it s a great stash buster in 2 different sizes for men & women it makes a perfect last minute gift enjoy **please note the pattern has been updated 2nd february 2014 if you have printed the pattern prior to this date you should reprint the updated version for future use - ** materials 4 5mm crochet hook 4 colours of dk or 8 ply yarn approx 25m 27yds of each colour tapestry needle for weaving in ends gauge/gauge 16sts & 8 row to 10cm 4 sizes adult woman adult man abbreviations chain chain slip_stitch slip_stitch treble_crochet treble u s double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet u s single_crochet single_crochet please note pattern is written in british/australian crochet terms with u s crochet terms in parenthesis before you start you will need to decide which of your colours will be colour a colour b colour c & colour d for example the hat in the pictures is listed as follows colour a = navy blue colour b = grey colour c = olive colour d = turquoise
